00019 template <class Attribute>
00020 class TAttributeStaticInfo: virtual public IRealAttributeStaticInfo
00021 {
00022 public:
00023        TAttributeStaticInfo(
00024                             icomp::CBaseComponentStaticInfo& staticInfo,
00025                             const QByteArray& id,
00026                             const QByteArray& description,
00027                             const Attribute* defaultValuePtr,
00028                             int flags,
00029                             const istd::CClassInfo& relatedInterfaceInfo);
00030 
00031        // reimplemented (icomp::IRealAttributeStaticInfo)
00032        virtual const QByteArray& GetAttributeId() const;
00033        virtual void AddRelatedMetaId(int metaGroupId, const QByteArray& id, int flags);
00034 
00035        // reimplemented (icomp::IAttributeStaticInfo)
00036        virtual const QByteArray& GetAttributeDescription() const;
00037        virtual const iser::IObject* GetAttributeDefaultValue() const;
00038        virtual QByteArray GetAttributeTypeName() const;
00039        virtual IElementStaticInfo::Ids GetRelatedMetaIds(int metaGroupId, int flags, int flagsMask) const;
00040        virtual int GetAttributeFlags() const;
00041 
00042 private:
00043        QByteArray m_id;
00044        QByteArray m_description;
00045        const Attribute* m_defaultValuePtr;
00046        int m_attributeFlags;
00047 
00048        typedef QMap<QByteArray, int> IdsToFlagsMap;
00049        typedef QMap<int, IdsToFlagsMap> RelatedIdsMap;
00050        RelatedIdsMap m_relatedInterfacesMap;
00051 };

00056 template <class Attribute>
00057 TAttributeStaticInfo<Attribute>::TAttributeStaticInfo(
00058                      icomp::CBaseComponentStaticInfo& staticInfo,
00059                      const QByteArray& id,
00060                      const QByteArray& description,
00061                      const Attribute* defaultValuePtr,
00062                      int flags,
00063                      const istd::CClassInfo& relatedInterfaceInfo)
00064 :      m_id(id),
00065        m_description(description),
00066        m_defaultValuePtr(defaultValuePtr),
00067        m_attributeFlags(flags)
00068 {
00069        if (relatedInterfaceInfo.IsValid() && !relatedInterfaceInfo.IsVoid()){
00070               m_relatedInterfacesMap[IComponentStaticInfo::MGI_INTERFACES][relatedInterfaceInfo.GetName()] = flags;
00071        }
00072 
00073        staticInfo.RegisterAttributeInfo(id, this);
00074 }
00075

00077 // reimplemented (icomp::IRealAttributeStaticInfo)

00079 template <class Attribute>
00080 const QByteArray& TAttributeStaticInfo<Attribute>::GetAttributeId() const
00081 {
00082        return m_id;
00083 }
00084 
00085 
00086 template <class Attribute>
00087 void TAttributeStaticInfo<Attribute>::AddRelatedMetaId(int metaGroupId, const QByteArray& id, int flags)
00088 {
00089        IdsToFlagsMap& groupMap = m_relatedInterfacesMap[metaGroupId];
00090 
00091        IdsToFlagsMap::iterator foundIter = groupMap.find(id);
00092        if (foundIter != groupMap.end()){
00093               I_ASSERT((flags & (AF_REFERENCE | AF_FACTORY)) == (foundIter.value() & (AF_REFERENCE | AF_FACTORY)));    // factory can be combined with factory only and reference with reference
00094 
00095               foundIter.value() |= flags & AF_OBLIGATORY;      // is obligatory if once obligatory registred is
00096               foundIter.value() &= flags | ~AF_NULLABLE;       // is nullable if always nullable registred is
00097        }
00098        else{
00099               groupMap[id] = flags;
00100        }
00101 
00102        if (metaGroupId == IComponentStaticInfo::MGI_INTERFACES){
00103               m_attributeFlags |= flags & AF_OBLIGATORY;       // attribute is obligatory if one of declared interfaces obligatory is
00104               m_attributeFlags &= flags | ~AF_NULLABLE; // attribute is nullable if all of declared interfaces nullable are
00105        }
00106 }

00131 
00132 template <class Attribute>
00133 IElementStaticInfo::Ids TAttributeStaticInfo<Attribute>::GetRelatedMetaIds(int metaGroupId, int flags, int flagsMask) const
00134 {
00135        IElementStaticInfo::Ids retVal;
00136 
00137        RelatedIdsMap::ConstIterator foundGroupIter = m_relatedInterfacesMap.constFind(metaGroupId);
00138        if (foundGroupIter != m_relatedInterfacesMap.constEnd()){
00139               const IdsToFlagsMap& groupMap = foundGroupIter.value();
00140 
00141               for (         IdsToFlagsMap::const_iterator iter = groupMap.begin();
00142                                    iter != groupMap.end();
00143                                    ++iter){
00144                                           const QByteArray& id = iter.key();
00145                      int idFlags = iter.value();
00146 
00147                      if (((idFlags & flagsMask) == flags)){
00148                             retVal.insert(id);
00149                      }
00150               }
00151        }
00152 
00153        return retVal;
00154 }
